duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist in posting job openings and collaborating with the HR team.
Screen incoming resumes and maintain a database of potential candidates.
Provide support in drafting offer letters and coordinating the onboarding process.
Maintain and update HR records, files, and databases.
Support the HR team on various ad hoc projects and day-to-day HR duties.
Develop experience working on a wide variety of HR projects.
Developing a comprehensive understanding of HR functions and processes.
Assist with day-to-day HR duties, event planning support, and HR Information System (HRIS) updates.
Organize and attend company meetings and events.
Maintain and update HR records, files, and databases.
Support the HR team on various ad hoc projects.

education_certification.credential: Currently pursuing a Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or related field.
